turns.text: Well considering you moved here from California I guess the rain for the past few weeks has been different than what you have down there
turns.label: qy^d

turns.text: Yeah we have uh in California - Im in - I lived in central California We have rain couple times year and other than that you know it would be maybe October and then in the spring and then other than that there wouldnt be any rain
turns.label: ny

turns.text: Its kind of its kind of been drought out there hasnt it uh
turns.label: qy^g

turns.text: Yeah there has So here I know that uh last year there was some ice storms while I was out of the state and Im glad to see there havent been any this year
turns.label: ny

turns.text: Yeah yet Still could come huh
turns.label: aa

turns.text: Generally if were going to get them its not going to happen uh prior to January one
turns.label: sd

turns.text: You may get cold snap or two or some rain or something like weve been getting in December but --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- usually the bitterest weather if were going to have any comes in January and February
Then by March things are getting warm again so we really dont have as long cold season I guess as people up north
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah yeah its so hard to predict here
turns.label: aa

turns.text: Its been eighty degrees on Christmas day here before
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well today its not bad out there

turns.label: sd

Yeah So you do that even in January huh

As Houston say or Atlanta but it
-- more humid than Arizona and California for the most part
Dry but pretty even climate wasnt it
Well its pretty hot in the summer Its in the usually you know - for good three four weeks we have over hundred degrees
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Hundred when you have hundred here everybodys dying

turns.text: uh-huh yeah I know Well I lived in Africa for couple years in --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: -- Cameroon and thats tropical climate and it really feels similar to this --
What type what type of business takes you to those climates or was that just vacation or something
No I was uh working with uh I still work with Wycliff Bible Translators

turns.text: Its an organization where we are looking to translate the BIBLE into languages of the world that arent yet written
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Not so much still trying to translate old texts as just trying to translate modern versions into other languages
turns.label: bf

turns.label: aa

turns.text: -- you know first an alphabet is developed and then uh -
You dont think about that as career normal career uh when --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: -- youre thinking of things that people might be doing
Yeah well its based here uh the international headquarters for Wycliff Bible Translators is right here in in Dallas
turns.label: b

turns.label: bf

turns.text: Yeah right now I am Thats what brought me here yeah

-- I agree I agree I I thought the fall was really nice

Particularly if Im going to be outdoors --
-- and doing uh outdoor activity hiking and things And thats --
Yeah you probably do lot of that with --

And then when you get one of those tornado type --
